headline.print_headline: Groups Urge a Moratorium On City Use of Artificial Turf
headline.main: Groups Urge a Moratorium on City Use of Artificial Turf

docs.lead_paragraph: Critics have said that synthetic turf, particularly crumb rubber fields made from recycled tires, may pose risks to athletes because of the presence of a possible carcinogen.
docs.snippet: Critics have said that synthetic turf, particularly crumb rubber fields made from recycled tires, may pose risks to athletes because of the presence of a possible carcinogen.
